about_the_game:
After falling down the magical Narra tree inside his bahay kubo (nipa hut), it’s up to Kata to rebuild and carry his house to the top of the tree — but he can’t do it alone!

Join Kata as he climbs up and ventures through different areas representing major themes in Filipino culture. Prepare to meet a wide cast of characters based on Filipino nature and mythology to help — or mislead — Kata on his journey. Learn skills stemming from Filipino art forms and craftsmanship to traverse around and across the wonders and perils of the Narra tree!

FEATURES:

  • Responsive Platforming Movement

Run, jump, and dash your way across and up the magical Narra tree!

  • Intuitive Minigames & Puzzles

Solve, endure, and overcome challenging minigames and puzzles relating to various themes and art forms.

  • Heartwarming Narrative

Tells a compelling story that focuses on Filipino themes such as community, hospitality, and bayanihan.

  • Focus on Filipino Cultural Art

Discover and delve into Filipino art forms such as visual arts, dance, theatre, and literature!

  • Rich Environmental Exploration

Explore unique areas inspired by diverse Filipino arts, cultures, peoples, animals, and more; all presented through hand-drawn art and topped with their own background music!

  • Charming Characters

Meet a wide range of characters! They will join you on your journey, helping you carry your house and teaching you new abilities.

  • Cutscene Animatics

Experience the story through endearing hand drawn animatics! Watch the story unfold and charm not only your eyes, but your heart as well.

  • Traditional Music

Travel while accompanied by modern arrangements of traditional Filipino folk music, inspired by local composers such as Augusto Espino and Bernardino Custodio.
